name: TEAM International
description:
TEAM International has over 25 years of experience empowering innovation in companies around the world by providing customized, high-quality, and business-focused IT and software development solutions.
 
Gain the bandwidth and expertise needed to drive your business forward with our flexible and scalable IT and software development solutions:
 
Software Development Outsourcing
Automation Services
Software QA & Testing
Microsoft Services
Professional IT Consulting Services
Data Analytics Services
Managed IT Services
 
We have deep knowledge and experience in a range of industries, including logistics, oil & gas, telecom, technology and innovation, financial services, healthcare, and more.
 
Our nearshore/offshore delivery centers in Ukraine, Colombia, and Poland continually seek out and retain world-class and 100% English-speaking IT talent to meet your unique business and technical requirements.
 

Visit www.teaminternational.com to learn more!
